Posts.Content: dreidteacher wrote: my immunotherapy trial was not working and oncologist is switching Bach to chemotherapy. I'm triple negative, but this is going to be a pill form, and the name sounds like it starts with an s or a c. I hope someone here knows what it could be. Also you are on it 2weeks and off a week. Thanks Diagnosis: 5/5/2011, left IDC, 7cm , Stage IIIa, Grade 3, 4/8 nodes, ER+/PR+, HER2- right- 2 IDC's Grade 2 Feb 2015 Metastatic triple neg to chest wall and skin. Treatment Feb 2015 carbo/Gemzar. April 2015 Halaven Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Changing chemotherapy and need info from you dreidteacher kt1966

Posts.Content: dreidteacher wrote: I have been following this forum with  interest as I was diagnosed with lymphedema in December. Merry Christmas to me. Started therapy in January going twice a week. Massage with wrapping fingers, hand. arm to get swelling down before they could measure for the sleeve. Finally got the sleeve and glove last week. Started wearing it and now my hand is worse than ever. Still wrapping at night, but should I stop the sleeve and glove and do wrapping during day again too? My therapist is out of town this week and as a teacher we are in middle of testing so I really do need my hand for writing this week and next.  Wrapping is not good for writing and has been difficult with what I do in the classroom, but I want to do the best for my arm. I must say all of you are an inspiration to me as lymphedema is the worst thing about cancer. Any thoughts will be appreciated. Thanks, Cathy Diagnosis: 5/5/2011, left IDC, 7cm , Stage IIIa, Grade 3, 4/8 nodes, ER+/PR+, HER2- right- 2 IDC's Grade 2 Feb 2015 Metastatic triple neg to chest wall and skin. Treatment Feb 2015 carbo/Gemzar. April 2015 Halaven Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: question about hand swelling dreidteacher jinky

Posts.Content: dreidteacher wrote: Hello, I'm new here. Yesterday went in for the core biospy, but they found more areas of concern. They ended up doing four different areas. Now at least I'm bruised on both sides. They were very nice and I couldn't ask for better people. Now I'm waiting....They told me I should hear some results today. Diagnosis: 5/5/2011, left IDC, 7cm , Stage IIIa, Grade 3, 4/8 nodes, ER+/PR+, HER2- right- 2 IDC's Grade 2 Feb 2015 Metastatic triple neg to chest wall and skin. Treatment Feb 2015 carbo/Gemzar. Posts.Title: Had the core biospy yesterday dreidteacher shells43

Posts.Content: dreidteacher wrote: I everyone I'm saddened that I have had to have my drains put back in. My double mastectomy was early May. The drains were removed at the beginning of June. Started chemo after a week or two and had to go to surgeon to have the fluid  drained after chemo each time. On Tuedsday she put the drains back in as she felt it was needed. Have any of you experienced this? When do you finally stop collecting fluid? Any information will be appreciated. Thanks,      Cathy Diagnosis: 5/5/2011, left IDC, 7cm , Stage IIIa, Grade 3, 4/8 nodes, ER+/PR+, HER2- right- 2 IDC's Grade 2 Feb 2015 Metastatic triple neg to chest wall and skin. Treatment Feb 2015 carbo/Gemzar. April 2015 Halaven Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: anyone have return of the drains! dreidteacher kmpod

Posts.Content: dreidteacher wrote: Thursday I had 4 core biopsies in different areas of both breasts. They called to let me know that I'm positive for cancer in all the biopsies. The nurse only knew the positive results but no other information.I meet with my team on the 21st. Is this the way they start you out? I don't know how bad or what degree, but my mind is going crazy! I keep thinking I have so much to do as in my family, job, and taking care of others. I'm getting my list of questions ready for the doctors, what else do I need to do this week before the meet? Oh, this is a party I wish I wasn't invited to, but will attend. Thank you for your inspiration and openess on the boards. Cathy in South Carolina Diagnosis: 5/5/2011, left IDC, 7cm , Stage IIIa, Grade 3, 4/8 nodes, ER+/PR+, HER2- right- 2 IDC's Grade 2 Feb 2015 Metastatic triple neg to chest wall and skin. Treatment Feb 2015 carbo/Gemzar. April 2015 Halaven Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: I got the phone call, now I'm in a panic dreidteacher irish22

Posts.Content: dreidteacher wrote:  Sorry this is long and rambles. I went to my new breast surgeon on Tuesday( other one retired) due to some concerns I have. I had surgery in May but still get swollen with fluid and have pain on the side of the largest tumor. There are two areas that are very painful if touched. I thought removing fluid could help.  She examined me but didn't remove fluid. I also have headaches and back pain that I blame on Tamoxifen.  Due to all  this I will have my first scan. I have never been scanned before and the doctor wants it for restaging.  What will a PET scan tell? How long does it take? Is it uncomfortable?  Is it like an MRI?   A few years ago my husband had an MRI and they had to stop as he couldn't handle it. They had to reschedule and drug him. Thank you for any information. Diagnosis: 5/5/2011, left IDC, 7cm , Stage IIIa, Grade 3, 4/8 nodes, ER+/PR+, HER2- right- 2 IDC's Grade 2 Feb 2015 Metastatic triple neg to chest wall and skin. Treatment Feb 2015 carbo/Gemzar. April 2015 Halaven Log in to post a reply
